about_the_game:
In 42 Ways To Die In Space, you play as Ball-E who lost his way while travelling in the endlessness of space. But just when he was about to run out of energy, he stumbled upon a place rich in power cores which allow him to survive a little longer every time he pick one up. However, this place is also rich with strange and dangerous obstacles. Help Ball-E survive and find the source of this anomaly.

In this action arena rogue-lite you have to avoid all the strange obstacles in an ever-changing gauntlet to survive. Manage your draining energy levels by picking up power cores. Use these cores to buy upgrades, items and more to progress and reach the end. Slowly unlock more features as you get further in the game. Add optional modifiers to your run to add extra challenge. Explore a gallery of your journey with a compendium of the various obstacles, achievements and game statistics.

short_description: Survive in space by dodging strange obstacles in an ever-changing gauntlet and reach the end to defeat entropy. Fly with limited resources, get stronger with upgrades and make the right decisions in this action arena rogue-lite. Warning: there is only 1 way to live but 42 ways to die in space...
